title: Inter Miami vs. Atlanta United score, live tracker: Lionel Messi and Co. face elimination in MLS playoffs
description: Follow our live blog for up-to-the-minute updates, expert analysis and insight as Miami's star-studded squad fight to keep their title hopes alive.
author: Yahoo Sports
excerpt: Follow our live blog for up-to-the-minute updates, expert analysis and insight as Miami's star-studded squad fight to keep their title hopes alive.
text: Inter Miami's Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez arrive at Chase Stadium in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, on Saturday ahead of their win-or-go-home playoff showdown vs. Atlanta United. (Photo by Chris Arjoon/AFP)Inter Miami's dream season reaches a pivotal moment as they host Atlanta Untied in Game 3 of their MLS Cup Playoff opener. After splitting the first two games, Saturday's showdown at Chase Stadium in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, is a high-stakes decider, with Miami aiming to avoid an early playoff exit and continue their record-breaking run.For the Herons, this season has been transformational. Lionel Messi, Sergio Busquets, Luis Suarez and Jordi Alba have made Miami the team to beat, earning the Eastern Conference's top seed with a record 74 points. But ninth-seeded Atlanta has already shown resilience, winning Game 2 with a dramatic stoppage-time goal from Xande Silva.Miami's path to victory will hinge on controlling the tempo and minimizing defensive errors, as Atlanta's pace has caused some trouble. Messi, despite missing a chunk of the season, has already posted impressive numbers, and Saturday offers a perfect stage for his playoff breakthrough. Atlanta, meanwhile, will look to frustrate Miami's midfield rhythm, with leading scorer Saba Lobzhanidze aiming to exploit any lapses.With all eyes on Fort Lauderdale, Miami's star-studded squad has the pressure — and the potential — to move one step closer to a championship. Kickoff is at 8 p.m. ET on MLS Season Pass on Apple TV.Follow our live blog below for up-to-the-minute updates, expert analysis and insight as Messi and Co. fight to keep their title hopes alive.Live2 updatesSat, November 9, 2024 at 8:08 PM ESTInter Miami lineupSat, November 9, 2024 at 8:05 PM ESTInter Miami vs. Atlanta United match infoLionel Messi and Co. host Atlanta on Saturday in Fort Lauderdale in a must-win match. Both teams defended home turf and so it all comes down to Game 3 for a chance to advance to the conference semifinals. The winner will face the winner of Orlando City vs. Charlotte, which is currently in stoppage-time. Charlotte holds a 1-0 lead.How to watch Inter Miami vs. Atlanta UnitedTime: 8 p.m. ETLocation: Chase Stadium | Fort Lauderdale, FloridaStreaming: MLS Season Pass on Apple TV
html:
Inter Miami's dream season reaches a pivotal moment as they host Atlanta Untied in Game 3 of their MLS Cup Playoff opener. After splitting the first two games, Saturday's showdown at Chase Stadium in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, is a high-stakes decider, with Miami aiming to avoid an early playoff exit and continue their record-breaking run.

For the Herons, this season has been transformational. Lionel Messi, Sergio Busquets, Luis Suarez and Jordi Alba have made Miami the team to beat, earning the Eastern Conference's top seed with a record 74 points. But ninth-seeded Atlanta has already shown resilience, winning Game 2 with a dramatic stoppage-time goal from Xande Silva.

Miami's path to victory will hinge on controlling the tempo and minimizing defensive errors, as Atlanta's pace has caused some trouble. Messi, despite missing a chunk of the season, has already posted impressive numbers, and Saturday offers a perfect stage for his playoff breakthrough. Atlanta, meanwhile, will look to frustrate Miami's midfield rhythm, with leading scorer Saba Lobzhanidze aiming to exploit any lapses.

With all eyes on Fort Lauderdale, Miami's star-studded squad has the pressure — and the potential — to move one step closer to a championship. Kickoff is at 8 p.m. ET on MLS Season Pass on Apple TV.

Follow our live blog below for up-to-the-minute updates, expert analysis and insight as Messi and Co. fight to keep their title hopes alive.

Live2 updates

  • Sat, November 9, 2024 at 8:08 PM EST

    Inter Miami lineup

  • Sat, November 9, 2024 at 8:05 PM EST

    Inter Miami vs. Atlanta United match info

    Lionel Messi and Co. host Atlanta on Saturday in Fort Lauderdale in a must-win match. Both teams defended home turf and so it all comes down to Game 3 for a chance to advance to the conference semifinals. The winner will face the winner of Orlando City vs. Charlotte, which is currently in stoppage-time. Charlotte holds a 1-0 lead.

How to watch Inter Miami vs. Atlanta United

  • Time: 8 p.m. ET

  • Location: Chase Stadium | Fort Lauderdale, Florida

  • Streaming: MLS Season Pass on Apple TV
